name: Skeleton Social
description: Skeleton Social is a cross-platform social media app (web, Android) designed for anonymous self-expression. It features secret sharing, personalized matchmaking, and secure one-on-one chats in a judgment-free space.

name: Garrden Therapist
description: Garden Therapist is an AI-powered web app built for the Basedspace AI Hackathon in Lithuania. It features a “Mediator” tool that guides two users through structured, real-time conversations to foster meaningful dialogue.

name: Dev Links
description: DevLinks is a full-stack link-sharing app that lets users manage, preview, and reorder their links with drag-and-drop functionality. It includes user authentication, profile customization, real-time validations, and responsive design for seamless access across devices.

name: NoxeraFX
description: A forex platform where professional traders trade for clients. It's a personal project to test my knowledge of user management.
